headline: Inspire millennial women to assess their cancer risk
campaignDescription: Bright Pink is on a mission to help young women understand their breast and ovarian cancer risk and empower them to manage their health proactively. C&C has stood side-by-side with Bright Pink for over five years as a digital growth partner, helping to power the organization’s initiatives. Together, we’ve built and scaled a digital ad model that has inspired over 2,000,000 millennial women (and counting) to complete an online cancer risk assessment; we’ve launched Call Your Doctor Day, and brought fresh meaning to other moments in the calendar, including Mother’s Day and Ovarian and Breast Cancer Awareness Months; we’ve fueled fundraising initiatives, from the Chicago Marathon to Giving Tuesday; and we’ve used digital to connect strategically and meaningfully with diverse, high-risk communities.
mainTakeaway: Messenger lowers Cost Per Email by 150%
supportiveText: Coupled with an average of 0:38 time on content
yellowBoxHeadline: What we learned along the way
yellowBoxContent: When we began this project with Carton Council, Messenger chatbots were relatively new, and we were cautiously optimistic that it could be a good tool for this kind of information-heavy campaign where we aim to gather emails. The results far exceeded expectations, and offered a third benefit we hadn’t anticipated: it allowed us to track intent to recycle, too, opening up the possibility of personalized, ongoing recycling reminders.

carousel.body: Our messenger chatbot was a popular tool that also helped verify that citizens were getting the info relevant to them, and that they had intentions to begin or get better about their recycling habits.

clientTestimony: With Craft & Commerce, we have been able to see our impact in real time, and know that our message is turning into action.”
